hereSection.title: Get a loan while you are learning and playing.
hereSection.videoDescription: We know that obtaining a loan is not easy, that is why we help you achieve your goals with microcredits.

howItWorks.firstDescription: Start building your credit history on blockchain and acquire loans.
howItWorks.secondDescription: Learn basic decentralized finance courses and acquire your first crypto loan.
howItWorks.thirdDescription: Unlock challenges every week as you learn and get a loan
howItWorks.fourthDescription: Get your first crypto loan and build history

getStarted.title: How to start?
getStarted.description: To obtain a loan with us you must complete 4 challenges in 4 weeks. And if you are new, don't worry, we have totally free courses for you.
getStarted.imageDescription: Sign up now and get your first credit with a $10 bonus!
getStarted.firstCourse: Connect or open your first crypto wallet
getStarted.firstDescription: Do you want to get a crypto loan? Don't know where to start? The first step is to create a wallet..
getStarted.secondDescription: Do you want to get a crypto loan? Don't know where to start? The first step is to create a wallet..
getStarted.thirdDescription: Do you want to get a crypto loan? Don't know where to start? The first step is to create a wallet..
getStarted.fourthDescription: Do you want to get a crypto loan? Don't know where to start? The first step is to create a wallet..

calculateLoan.title: Calculate your loan
calculateLoan.subtitle: In how many months do you want to pay?

freeCourses.shortDescription: Do you need to learn more?
freeCourses.title: Let´s start with free courses
freeCourses.description: Choose from a variety of courses those that are relevant to your profile.
freeCourses.firstCourseDescription: Understand decentralized finance, key to your financial path
freeCourses.secondCourseDescription: Learn about the blockchain that is revolutionizing the crypto world
freeCourses.thirdCourseDescription: learn the basic concepts of web3 and blockchain

investorInterest.title: Do you want to be an investor?
investorInterest.description: Leave us your information and we will contact you to tell you all the benefits of being an investor with us.
investorInterest.inputName: Could your write your phone names?
investorInterest.inputEmail: Could your write your phone email?
investorInterest.inputPhone: Could your write your phone number?

credit_score.description: The score ranges from 1 to 1000, the closer to 1000, the better financing opportunities you will have.

loan_route.title: Start the route to request your loan!

steps.title: open or connect your account
steps.description: To start building your credit history, start with your first step.

get_loan.title: GET YOUR LOAN
get_loan.description: Choose how much you want us to lend you and in how much time. Calculate here

my_loans.title: My loans
my_loans.description: AT THE MOMENT YOU HAVE NO LOANS, request one now.

challenges.title: CHALLENGE 1: Open or connect 3 Coinbase accounts
challenges.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

confirmation.title: Challenge 1 Confirmation
confirmation.description: Challenge 1 sent! Thank you for sending us your challenge. We will review and approve it within 24 hours. Remember that the next challenge will open in 7 days

challenges.title: CHALLENGE 2: Open or connect your Farcaster account
CHALLENGE 3: Save 2 USD for one week
challenges.description: Prove to be a committed saver

account_address.title: Deposit account address
account_address.description: We will deposit the loan into this account. It must be in USDC and on the Base network.

email_address.title: Email address
email_address.description: We will send payment notifications to this email

loan_amount.title: Disburse your loan
loan_amount.description: Choose how much you want us to lend you

repayment_period.description: IN HOW MANY MONTHS DO YOU WANT TO PAY?

confirmation.description: We have already disbursed your loan! You can see the transaction details here: 0xsdj2932mfekvcj24fn288f8fn

dashboard.title: DASHBOARD
dashboard.congratulations: Congratulations on getting your first loan!
dashboard.description: You can request a new loan when you finish paying off your current loan.

gift.description: Now you can claim your 10 USDC gift!

confirmation.title: Payment made
confirmation.description: Congratulations, you have paid your first installment on time!
